articles.description: The 25-year-old, who has 48 international caps for Ukraine, has been vocal in his support for his homeland. Several Ukrainian flags were on show at the vigil on Thursday night.
articles.content:
Manchester City defender Oleksandr Zinchenko attended an anti-war vigil in Manchester on Thursday evening following Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

articles.title: My Premier League GW27 PREDICTIONS (and cup final) - HITC Sport
articles.description: The Irish Guy predicts the Premier League results for Gameweek 27, and also the EFL Cup final between Chelsea and Liverpool.

articles.author: Mike Keegan, Kishan Vaghela
articles.title: UEFA set to TERMINATE £66m deal with Russian state energy company Gazprom - Daily Mail
articles.description: UEFA are set to terminate their controversial £66m sponsorship deal with Russian state energy company Gazprom in time for the next Champions League fixtures on March 8.
articles.content:
UEFA are set to terminate their controversial £66m sponsorship deal with Russian state energy company Gazprom.
